Translations.Text: For those who guard (against evil), there will certainly be gardens of bliss with their Lord
Shall We make those who submit (as Muslims), like the criminals
What is (wrong) with you? How do you judge
Or have you a book through which you learn
that you shall have therein what you choose
Or do you have an agreement from Us which extends till the day of resurrection that you will have what you order (for)
Ask them, which of them will be a claimant of that
Or have they partners? Then let them bring their partners if they are truthful
On the day (the covering) will be removed from the ankle (there being a calamity), and they will be called for prostrations, but they will not be able to (prostrate)
their looks will be humbled, disgrace will cover them. And indeed they used to be called for prostrations when they were sound, (but they used to refuse)
So leave Me and him who denies this statement, We will gradually catch them from such a position that they will not know
And I give them time, My plot is certainly firm
Do you ask them for a reward so that they are burdened with a lasting difficulty
Or is (the knowledge of) the unseen with them, so that they write (it) down
So wait patiently for the command of your Lord and do not be like the companion of the fish (Jonah) when he called out while he was in grief
Had the favour of his Lord not reached him, he would have been (left) cast on the naked shore while he was blamed
Then his Lord chose him and made him of the righteous

And those who do not believe, when they hear the reminder, (give such an impression) by their looks that they would almost pull you down from your position and say, “He is indeed under the influence of the jinn.”
And this is nothing but a reminder to the worlds
